title: President felicitates Weligama Gnanarathana Thera on his 101st birthday
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – pix by: Sudath Silva – President Mahinda Rajapaksa called on Chief Incumbent of the Mallikarama Viharaya in Ratmalana, Rajakeeya Pandith, Vinaya Visharadha Dhammakeerthi, Most Venerable Weligama Sri Gnanarathana Nayaka thero whose 101st birthday fell on 14 October.
